Genomics_ConceptTask.TEXT: FW, LD, and WZ conceived the experiments. SC and CW conducted the experiments and analyzed the results. DZ, GL, and XW provided the laboratory support and vaccine immunization. YL, SZ, SF, XH, BY, and QZ contributed reagents. QC, CM, and ZZ contributed strains and materials. QA and YC uploaded RNA-seq data. The manuscript was written and reanalyzed by SC. All authors have approved the final manuscript.
